General.Name: 3Peak Inc
General.Description: 3Peak Incorporated, a fabless semiconductor company, focusing on providing various analog products and technologies. Its products include linear, data converter, drivers, analog integrated circuits, interface, power supervisors, battery management, and power management products used in new energy, automotive, communication, medical and healthcare, consumer electronics, and other industrial applications. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Shanghai, China.
